ing.item: Parm. cheese paparika (to taste I put about 1 table spoon) cayenne pepper (to taste I put about 1/4 teaspoon)

directions.step:
Chop up artichoke hearts (I put them in the food processor) and mix with all of the other stuff. Put in an oven safe bowl and bake @ 350 for 20 minutes or pop in the microwave for 4 minutes.
Dip what ever you like I prefer wheatable crakers. Shared by Laura Aden Posted to MC-Recipe Digest V1 #237
Date: Wed, 09 Oct 1996 08:20:35 -0700
From: Gerald Edgerton <jerrye@wizard.com>
